channel.title: Data Analysis on Vasthav's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Vasthav's Blog

item.title: Udacity Data Science Nano Degree - Starbuck's Capstone Challenge
item.description: Introduction As part of the Udacity - Data Science Nano Degree program I recently completed a task where I had to use a given data set, analyse it and come up with heuristics based recommendations. This blog post will present the final conclusions and recommendations I came up with after the analysis.

item.title: Finding price trends and top neighbourhoods for affordable stays using Seattle Airbnb data
item.description: Introduction As part of the Udacity - Data Science Nano Degree program I recently completed a task where I had to use a given data set, analyse it and ask between 3-5 questions related to the business or real-world context of the data. And then each question must be answered with appropriate visualization, table, or statistic.
